fields.description:
Need to verify C.I./Test Automation integration. 

1. manual file change
2. manual GitHub commit to sandbox repository
3. automation trigger fired from GitHub to Jenkins 
4. Jenkins launch of Build tasks on slave platform: build sandbox project
5. Jenkins confirmation of successful build
6. Jenkins launch of post-build script
7. Post build script execution of Drillbit test: on slave platform - OSx and iOS
fields.summary: Verify C.I./Test Automation (sandbox) functionality - automated Build and Drillbit launch - iOS and OSx
fields.environment: Linux-based Jenkins CI server, OSx-based Jenkins slave platform, iOS SDK/Drillbit

comments.body: Omitting steps 1-3 due to decision for polling GitHub rather than "commit" trigger. Going forward, may be safe to begin testing on live platform - working with cloned projects (of course) and sending slave tasks to "Blinky" (available OSx server in IT) or even my MAC OSx.
